function EP02_05()
    --.起-4【4月第1週】「乙女はお姫さまに恋してる」
    SaveData.Title = "乙女はお姫さまに恋してる"

    --//BG：メインストリート（春）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0146.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "...Alright!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The hellish holiday ended, and a new hell began. I take heavy steps as I walk down the main street of Yuriai Private Academy. ]])
    --//CG：登校シーン（緊張）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVb007aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mr. Ito】
 "Oh, Ikusa-san. Good day to you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0147.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile
 "E-eh, g-good day to you... too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Good day!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0148.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile
 "G-good day." ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to the holiday training, I’ve become able to exchange greetings with the girls passing by. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m still aware it’s awkward, but even so, it’s a step forward. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sad
 (After wandering the town alone, getting tangled by strange people… it’s really been a tough day...) ]])

    MSG([[ But because of that, I should have become mentally much stronger. First, I’ll do my best to get through this first day. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0150.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 (No matter what happens now, I won’t scream weirdly anymore!) ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：ヒユ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-300)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,50,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,150,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(150)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "We’ve been waiting for youuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu!!!!!!" ]])

PLAY_SE("SEc037.wav")
EFFECT_SCREEN(1,20,20,500,false,false)
WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0151.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered
 "Hiiiiyaaaahhh!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Thanks to Hiyu-san’s tackle, my firm resolve snapped more easily than a twig. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san hugged my side and looked up at me with sparkling eyes. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0152.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile, sweat
 "H-Hiyu-san, good day to you. Is something the matter?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0072.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "Good day, Erika-onee-sama! Nothing’s wrong! If anything, it’s just that your beauty is making me lose my mind!" ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, the pressure is intense. She’s always loved beautiful girls, but was she really like this with me too...? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0153.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised
 "A-about calling me onee-sama? We’re classmates, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】excited
 "Age doesn’t matter! From the moment you saved me from that pervert’s blade that day, I was reborn as your little sister, Erika-onee-sama!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】excited
 "Your coolness, beauty, and dignity... no matter how many times I remember it, it brings me to tears! Erika-onee-sama, you are truly the supreme beauty!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0154.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile
 "Y-you’re exaggerating. I’m really not such a remarkable person..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0075.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】excited
 "Huff... huff... Even through your clothes, I can tell your muscles are slender and toned... a miraculous body of beauty..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】excited
 "I already bled as much as I could from my nose, but I feel like I’m going to again... hehehe." ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san rubs my side while breathing heavily. ]])

    MSG([[ No good, she’s totally tripping. She’s not really in a state to listen to me. ]])

    MSG([[ I-If she touches me that much, it might be exposed... but I don’t want to forcefully pull her away either... ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
PLAY_SE("SEa001.wav")
WAIT(800)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01hb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0155.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】blushing
 "H-Hiyu-san... could you please stop a little there...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】surprised
 "That’s right! There’s something I want to show you right away, onee-sama!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised
 "Whoa!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Without letting me say a word, Hiyu-san dragged me toward the school building. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I couldn’t keep up with the rapid developments, just letting things happen. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

    --//BG:1Ｆ廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 500,false)

    --//BG:4Ｆ廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：1-A教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ In the classroom I was led to, some girls who must be classmates welcomed me at the entrance with smiles. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    --//BU：女子生徒×MAX
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,0,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-550,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-900,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,550,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,900,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-350,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-700,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,350,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,700,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_027")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "We’ve been waiting for you, Erika-onee-sama!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：ヒユ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0078.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "See? This is what it means! Our whole class has decided to support Erika-onee-sama as the ‘Princess’!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sad
 "Eh... what do you mean?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It’s such a sudden development I can’t keep up. What on earth is going on? ]])

    MSG([[ Why did everyone come to greet me? And why are they all calling me onee-sama? I can’t grasp the situation at all. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】flustered
 "C-could it be onee-sama... you don’t know about the ‘Knight System’?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0158_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised
 "‘Knights’—is that the thing Hiyu-san mentioned? I-I’m sorry... I really don’t know much about Yuriai Private Academy’s culture..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The classmates all suddenly went silent. ]])

    MSG([[ W-was that a faux pas? No one would want to support as ‘Princess’ someone who’s ignorant of the school’s culture. ]])

    MSG([[ But then. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "Hy-hyuaaaaah! Did everyone hear that?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0081.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "Despite knowing nothing about Yuriai Private Academy’s culture, Erika-onee-sama was chosen as a ‘Princess’ candidate! If that’s not fate, then what is!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//BU：女子生徒×３
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "What such a pure-hearted person." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "That troubled reaction must be because of a lack of interest in the ‘Princess’!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "To be so unselfish with that appearance and spirit... truly befitting of a ‘Princess’." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0159.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sad
 (A-am I being taken way too positively!? ) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’m simply unstudied... but it feels like this image is running away on its own. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0160.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile
 "By the way, what exactly is that Knight System?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】surprised
 "Sorry! I interrupted your question." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "You probably already guessed it... but Erika-onee-sama’s actions at the entrance ceremony instantly thrust her into the running for ‘Princess’." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "If she places first at the Princess Election in June, she will happily join the Four Princesses!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "However, not just anyone can enter this election — you have to gather 40 supporters from a whole class." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】serious
 "Those supporters are the ‘Knights’. They are the shield that protects Erika-onee-sama, and the spear that pierces external enemies!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】serious
 "Right now, excluding Erika-onee-sama, the entire Class 1-A of 41 students have volunteered as ‘Knights’, officially making her a ‘Princess’ candidate!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0161.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised
 "I-see. Calling the Princess’s supporters ‘Knights’ has a nice ring to it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ When Hiyu-san said she’d become Uran-san’s Knight on entrance day, she meant becoming her supporter. Finally, I’m starting to understand the school’s culture. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0162_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Are the people who followed Uran-san and Daria-san also ‘Knights’?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】normal
 "Yes, that’s right. Knights look up to their Princess as a beauty ideal, so their fashion naturally tends to be similar." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "Of course, from now on we’re all going to look up to Erika-onee-sama as our goal!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0163.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile, sweat
 "Ah, ahahaha." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ If they find out I’m a guy, everyone would probably pass out. That means I absolutely can’t reveal my true identity. ]])

    MSG([[ Winning the ‘Princess’ position is the best way to get closer to Marika-neesan’s clue, so it’s great news, but seeing everyone’s affectionate reaction makes me somewhat uneasy. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0164.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "Everyone, are you sure? You still don’t really know much about me, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0165.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sad
 "I’m really grateful for your support... but I’m definitely not as noble as you think." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0166.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sad
 "Wouldn’t it be better to take a little more time before deciding?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At my question, the classmates look at each other and laugh. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "Erika-onee-sama, it’s your kindness that drew us to you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0167.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised
 "Eh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0091_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】serious
 "It’s true that we were captivated by you after the pervert incident, but we didn’t support you out of just a fangirl crush." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】serious
 "Even though you were injured then, you worried about my safety and the entrance ceremony." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "What a kind person. After that entrance ceremony, the whole class was buzzing about Erika-onee-sama." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】smiling
 "We were drawn to the maternal love-like deep compassion behind your courage and strength!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0168.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised
 "A-after the entrance ceremony, that happened...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At that time, everyone went silent at my remark. I thought they might suspect my true identity, but instead they took it positively. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0169.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile, sweat
 "I-it’s a bit embarrassing... I just said something obvious." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】flustered
 "Hyuahhh!! Another pure and adorable statement like that... no way, I can’t..." ]])
    --//SE：鼻血（ﾌﾞｼｬｯ）
PLAY_SE("SEa022.wav")
--WAIT(300)

    --//BU：ヒユ（焦り鼻血）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01gb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0170.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered
 "Hiyu-san!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-250,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --吉　シェイク

PLAY_SE("SEc035.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san started bleeding from her nose and collapsed. I quickly caught her and held her so she’d be comfortable. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】sad
 "I’m sorry for causing trouble this morning... I’ll carry you to the infirmary." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01cb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】surprised, nosebleed
 "O-Onee-sama!? This is..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised
 "Eh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

    MSG([[ I realized I’m inadvertently holding Hiyu-san in a princess carry. The classmates around us let out squeals. ]])

    MSG([[ C-crap! Another embarrassing action! But now there’s no way to put her down... ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 "Ah, alright! Hiyu-san, please bear with me a little longer!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】surprised, nosebleed
 "Hyua!?" ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf008.wav",1000)
    PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --//BG：廊下（2F）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000,false)

    --//SE：走る音
--PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
--WAIT(1000)

    MSG([[ At this point, the only choice is to get Hiyu-san to the infirmary before things turn into a big fuss! ...Or so I hope. ]])

    MSG([[ Still holding her in the princess carry, I head to the infirmary on the first floor at full speed, but without running. ]])

    MSG([[ However, things went way off plan— ]])

    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ・Ｄ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013af")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,80,80)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-500,100)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,650,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "H-Hey, isn’t that Erika Ikusa!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Princess carrying a classmate!? Such strength and beauty... truly a <r=いくさひめ>Battle Princess</r>!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Got the photo! The front page for noon’s edition is decided!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    --//SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",1000,false)

    MSG([[ The sight of me carrying Hiyu-san was witnessed by many, and that photo was put on the front page of the class newspaper. ]])

    MSG([[ Whether for better or worse, the mistaken image of ‘Erika Ikusa’ spread rapidly throughout the school against my will. ]])

    MSG([[ Thus, life at school as ‘Erika Ikusa’ began in a hectic fashion. ]])
    --　　　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
STOP_ALL_SOUND(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_06")

end
